G

GameInvoker - Class in Client
The class 'GameInvoker' handles the task of starting the game in the console and simulates one round in the game until the deck is empty It creates a GameManager object and asks the user for an input, one of which starts the game Shows the game implementation and includes dependency injection
GameInvoker() - Constructor for class Client.GameInvoker
 
GameManager - Class in BonanzaGame.Core
The class starts the game and implements the public interface IGameManager
GameManager() - Constructor for class BonanzaGame.Core.GameManager
 
GameManagerTest - Class in BonanzaGame.Test
 
GameManagerTest() - Constructor for class BonanzaGame.Test.GameManagerTest
 
GameModule - Class in BonanzaGame
 
GameModule() - Constructor for class BonanzaGame.GameModule
 
GameSettingItem - Class in BonanzaGame.Entities
The class 'GameSettingItem' describes a single user customizable setting for the game
GameSettingItem() - Constructor for class BonanzaGame.Entities.GameSettingItem
 
GameSettings - Class in BonanzaGame.Core
The class 'GameSettings' describes user customizable settings for the game It includes a collection of GameSettingItems which are able to tweak certain game variables
GameSettings() - Constructor for class BonanzaGame.Core.GameSettings
 
GameStates - Enum in BonanzaGame.Core.Enums
The enumeration 'GameStates' describes a datatype for possible states a game can be in This can be used to restrict access to certain methods

getWinner() - Method in class BonanzaGame.Core.GameManager
 
getWinner() - Method in interface BonanzaGame.Core.Interfaces.IGameManager
Method getWinner which calculates each players coins through the amount of cards in their treasury The player with the most coins is determined as the winner or else the result is a draw
